title: Perfectly sized, gorgeous 2 bed, 2 bath condo in Old City@@
description: Perfectly sized, gorgeous 2 bed, 2 bath condo in Old City’s Historic Bank Building. This unit is one of 17 luxury apartments with a doorperson and direct access to the fantastic amenities at the neighboring Renaissance Hotel including the gorgeous pool, fitness and business centers, and discounts on food, beverages, and hotel rooms. Light-filled open concept living and dining space with hardwood floors throughout and a custom-built seating nook. Top-of-the-line kitchen with ample storage space, subzero refrigerator, Mielé appliances, and a long island for great counter space and seating. Both bedrooms have good closet space and their own ensuite bathrooms attached, one with a nice shower/soaking tub and the other with a double vanity and enclosed glass shower. title: ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today!
description:
Offering Studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center City Philadelphia Apartments near Rittenhouse Square Be a part of history! ICON mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on the National Register of Historic Places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown Philadelphia apartment near Rittenhouse Square? You've found it! ICON is the most exciting rental property to ever grace Rittenhouse Square. A quintessential example of the Art Deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, ICON's design is inspired by Art Deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that Philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, ICON is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the Great Depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both Cunard's White Star Line and the United States Lines, and the esteemed Pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th Floor. Today, this history echoes throughout ICON, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its Art Deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: Kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors. Stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of Philadelphia. Enhanced Penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair Accessible Apartments Available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: Sky Deck with 360 View, Includes Grilling Station and Outdoor Living Area with Fireplace. Wellness Floor Featuring a Yoga Studio, Cardio, Weights, TRX & Boxing. Private Dining Room with Fireplace and Serving Kitchen. Club Level with Kitchen, Billiards, Flat-Screen TVs and Large Screen. Media Room for Private Parties. Business Center with Computers, Printers, Conference Rooms with A/V Capabilities. Media Room. Full Service Concierge. Parking Garage w/ Valet Parking Option. Package Receiving. Pet Grooming Station. On Site Property Management. Elevator. Charging Stations for Electric Cars. Cold Storage for Grocery Delivery. 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance. Pets Welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. title: FREE Parking in Manayunk?? Whaaaaaaaat?!  We have it!
description:
Thank you for your interest in The Glen at Shawmont Station Apartments. Below is our current availability and pricing. Below you will find information on each available unit as well as pre-recorded virtual tours. If you’d like to apply to any of these units, you can do so at www.theglenphilly.com. Information regarding amenities, utilities and pets are on the the website.
The Glen at Shawmont Station is proud to host various food trucks almost weekly on the property, all are welcome to join us!
The application process is easy.
1. Locate the apartment you want to rent on www.theglenphilly.com and hit “select”.
2. Complete the application on all parts and submit with the $500.00 security deposit and $50.00 application fee.
3. Send proof of income and photo ID to  show contact info
.
4. If approved with good credit your deposit remains $500.00. Approved conditionally the deposit is one month’s rent, the $500.00 initial deposit will go towards that and you would owe the balance at move in. If denied, the deposit is refunded in check form.
5. If you decide our community is not right for you after applying, you have 72 hours from applying to cancel in writing (email) to receive your refund of the $500.00. The deposit is not refundable after 72 hours if you cancel your application.
6. Your gross monthly income (this is income before taxes) must equal three times the monthly rent to be approved. Incomes are combined.
7. Twenty-four hours before move-in, you would pay your admin/city fees of $340.00, any pet fees if applicable and the first month’s rent.

Information regarding amenities, utilities and pets are on the the website.
The Glen at Shawmont Station is proud to host various food trucks almost weekly on the property, all are welcome to join us!
The application process is easy.
1. Locate the apartment you want to rent on www.theglenphilly.com and hit “select”.
2. Complete the application on all parts and submit with the $500.00 security deposit and $50.00 application fee.
3. Send proof of income and photo ID to  show contact info
.
4. If approved with good credit your deposit remains $500.00. Approved conditionally the deposit is one month’s rent, the $500.00 initial deposit will go towards that and you would owe the balance at move in. If denied, the deposit is refunded in check form.
5. If you decide our community is not right for you after applying, you have 72 hours from applying to cancel in writing (email) to receive your refund of the $500.00. The deposit is not refundable after 72 hours if you cancel your application.
6. Your gross monthly income (this is income before taxes) must equal three times the monthly rent to be approved. Incomes are combined.
7. Twenty-four hours before move-in, you would pay your admin/city fees of $340.00, any pet fees if applicable and the first month’s rent.

description:

This is the upper unit of a duplex (one bedroom apartment on first floor) that consists of an open floor plan, exposed brick, a ton of natural light, one large bedroom per floor, and a quiet block convenient to BSL and Girard Ave buses and trolleys.

3rd Flr: 14'x 20' bedroom

If you're a driver, getting onto I-76 or I-95 is simple via Girard Ave or taking Broad St down to I-676. Some of the best transportation options in the entire city! send your number.

title: You’ll never want to leave your neighborhood!
description:
This unit features an extra room which can be used as an office or an additional bedroom Welcome to your new home, 735 Spruce Street, located in the heart of Philadelphia’s charming and historic Washington Square West neighborhood. This apartment features tall ceilings, a spacious floor plan, plenty of storage space, and oversized windows. Washington Square houses a large collection of historic 18th and 19th-century residential architecture that offers you a glimpse into Philadelphia’s past. A charming district filled with cobblestone streets and brick structures, you will never tire of the wide array of dining, shopping, sightseeing, and museums. Local attractions include Washington Square Park (5-min walk) and Penn’s Landing (along the waterfront), while historic attractions include the Liberty Bell and Independence Hall. Whole Foods Market, ACME, and one of the most well-known restaurants in Philadelphia, Zahav, are all within walking distance of the Properties. With so many local amenities you’ll never want to leave your neighborhood! 735 Spruce is also immediately catty-corner to Pennsylvania Hospital, offering nurses, residents, doctors, and employees of the nearby institution immediate access to housing.

title: Superb updated twin in quite desired Somerton!
description:
Superb updated twin in quite desired Somerton! Entry to the main living floor is through the side door where updates are instantly apparent. This property has a Central Air! Previous owners have installed maintenance-free waterproof vinyl plank flooring and new windows on the rear wall and there's crown molding in the living and dining rooms. There's fresh paint throughout most of the home and the dining area has a gorgeous wood-look paneled wall that leads to your fully updated (2019!) kitchen with high hats and modern shaker grey cabinetry, Quartz countertops, undercabinet LED lighting and matching SS appliances: tons of counter space and storage with pantry and lazy susan; the space is utilized to perfection. The main floor powder room is at the top of the staircase leading down to your extended first level, and with vinyl planking. The laundry and utility room are located here with a convenient outside entrance. The size of this level needs to be seen in person as the addition really exponentially increases the liveability over the original footprint! A beautiful slider w/ internal blinds leads to an EP Henry-style paver patio in the backyard with included pergola. A bi-level deck and white privacy fence complete the backyard. Upstairs boasts original hardwoods, an updated common bath, and 3 comfortably sized bedrooms. For the buyer's peace of mind, the home is being offered with a one-year home warranty included! Schedule now!
